headline: Great Environment/Great People
pros:
Had the pleasure to work for a great group. 
Good place to work, experience
cons: Commute to work, nothing else negative to say

headline: Great Place
pros: Great work environment and an awesome staff
cons: Lots of hours and work on weekends

headline: Commission Only
pros: A lot of CTA's to "pitch" to clients and prospects.
cons: all cold calling, a lotta days u simply go to work to get hung up on all day and talk to no one.

headline: Great experience with an amazing team
pros: I loved working at Vision. Overall it was a very positive work environment.
cons: No cons I enjoyed working there

headline: Great Experience
pros: Great environment. Management is accessible and open to new ideas.
cons: I was moving when I left. Wish I could have stayed

headline: Run Away
pros: None.  The management only works in their best interests.
cons:
Management will ONLY let you make what they deem acceptable.  If you start doing well, they will, and have, broken the terms of your contract or agreements with them.  

They also will post personal assets as AOM to skew the numbers.  

If you are not a direct family member of one of the owneres, your career goes nowhere.

People in the mailroom get a larger bonus than the salespeople who bring the money in th make the company hum

headline: Great people, small shop
pros: Management is extremely nice and helpful. Office has a laid back atmosphere with plenty of fresh faces to bounce new ideas off of.
cons: Upper management only comes to town from New York every couple of weeks so the office can get lazy during the bi-weeks. Lots of finger pointing when problems arise.

headline: Consultant
pros: flexibility, work anywhere, long term staffs
cons: non-stop coverage, long term staffs, work anytime

headline: Could've been better!!
pros: Some of the people that I formed lasting relationships with!!
cons: Where would I begin!??!  Management has a very poor way of trying to grow the business. Too much of a "buddy-buddy" mentality.  Surprised that they are still in business!!

headline: Don't waste your time!
pros: The opportunity to get licensed. This company is a good for students or recent grads. Get what you can and get out!
cons: Everything! If you want to work like a slave and get pennies work here! Unorganized!
